title: need help game won't launch
body: It keeps saying "The file or Directory is corrupted and unreadable." what can i do to fix this? And it didn't happen until after i patched the game.

replies.body:
Eep that's not good!

You're going to need a repair if some of the game files are corrupted. You can do so through the client options by clicking **Initiate Repair**, but if you can't get to those options you'll need to use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). Grab that tool and run it with a **reinstall and clean uninstall** and that should do the trick!
